PathOfBuilding.Notes:
How To Make the Bow?
^xFFFF77Starter bow: ^7 Use Anger, hatred or wrath essence on a Ivory, bone, or spine bow base. You're looking for other ele dmg rolls and crit or attack speed on the suffix. An Ideal starter bow would be around 700 dps with crit chance crafted (crit chance is more dps then attack speed, but ideally you really want both).
^xFFFF77Endgame bow:^7 1) Use anger hatred or wrath essence on a Ivory, bone or Spine bow base that also has fractured lightning, fire or cold damage, ideally at least t2 if you're using deafening essence.
2) Spam essence until you hit t4 or better on the prefix (this depends on how much you want to spend)
3)Have 2 open suffix, if your suffixes are full you have to annul and if you only have 1 open suffix then you'll have to annul or craft "prefix cannot be changed" and scour.
4) Now craft "prefix cannot be changed" and then use a veiled chaos orb.
5) Before unveiling you need to craft "chaos damage over time multiplier" to block a bad outcome. After crafting, unveil and you're looking for attack speed or crit. The best outcome is crit with attributes. Now craft attack speed and your bow is done.
^xFFFF77Start quiver:^7
Theres not much crafting to be done here, I either slap on a few essence and just keep whatever (ideally have crit multi/life/crafted attack speed/damage with bow skills/flat ele) Or just buy from the trade website, as start quivers like these are very cheap. Using any cheap fractured base would also help.
^xFFFF77Endgame quiver:^7 1) buy a fractured +1 arrow or crit multi base. Feathered arrow/broadhead quiver are the best base, but it doesn't matter that much for lightning arrow, all bases are useable. (+1 arrow base is more expensive, but requires a lot less essence then the crit multi fractured base, all depends on prices, generally +1 arrow tends to be cheaper overall on league start)
2) Use Torment essence until you hit +1 arrow or crit multi
3) You now need 1 open suffix, if suffixes are full then you have to annul or beast craft suffix to prefix.
4) Your prefix cannot have anyother attack mod, only bow damage/life/essence mod is allowed. If you do have another attack mod, then you have to annul.
5) Craft "cannot roll attack mods" and exalt/annul until desired prefixes (you can only slam damage with bow skills/life, ideally you want t3+ on both, this can cost 1 divine or 10, very rng). (As long as you have "cannot roll attack mods" crafted, then you cannot annul anyother mod besides the life/damage with bow skills.)
^xAF6025^xE05030Tip^7:^7 ^x8888FF^x7070FF^xE05030^xC8C8C8^x3F6DB3^xAF6025^7Always test with craftofexile.com first to see if you're doing the craft correct, so you don't waste currency.^7^7^7^7^7^7^7
